subject: Football
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In his first season as the Jets’ coach, the news media dubbed Eric Mangini “Man Genius,” mistaking his tricks and sleight of hand for winning smarts. Now we’ll see what he’s got.
snippet: In his first season as the Jets’ coach, the news media dubbed Eric Mangini “Man Genius,” mistaking his tricks and sleight of hand for winning smarts. Now we’ll see what he’s got.
